synopsis: Reviewers often praise this kajal’s deep black payoff, smooth one‑stroke application, and budget‑friendly pricing. Many say it lasts for hours and doubles well as an eyeliner. However, a sizable number report smudging, fading within a few hours, and that it isn’t fully waterproof; a few also mention soft, break‑prone tips. Packaging and delivery experiences are generally positive.
key_takeaways: Intense, jet-black color with strong pigmentation in one to two strokes.
Smooth, creamy texture glides easily; can double as an eyeliner.
Frequently described as long lasting and good value for money.
Many users report smudging and limited wear time, not fully waterproof.

verdict.label: Buy
verdict.reasons: Weighted ratings (verified boosted) blended with sentiment.

footer: Summary based on user feedback for Faces Canada Magnet Eyes Kajal from the provided reviews; individual experiences may vary.
